column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I really hate to give this place a negative review because ever since I moved to Chicago ba ba reeba has been my go to for closest to authentic Spanish tapas
column2: but today that all changed. The patatas bravas Â were overly cooked
column3: almost burnt and were cut too big. I almost stopped ordering tapas after that because I felt if you mess up the potatoes
column4: the rest can also go downhill.
